channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Growing Role Of Commercial Support For Open Source Projects
item.description: While open source offers developers transparency and collaboration, it also presents challenges for companies that rely on these projects.

item.title: “Won’t get fooled again”

item.title: A Strategic Approach To Cloud Security Automation
item.description: As companies become increasingly cloud-reliant, one thing is clear: the benefits of cloud technology come with serious security risks.
